thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 24 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Invalda Invl AB - Trading In The Shares Of Invl Baltic Real Estate Renewed

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Invalda Invl AB - Trading In The Shares Of Invl Baltic Real Estate Renewed
text:
Jan 24 (Reuters) - Invalda Invl Ab:
* TRADING IN THE SHARES OF INVL BALTIC REAL ESTATE RENEWED * INCREASE OF NOMINAL VALUE OF INVL BALTIC REAL ESTATE‘S SHARES - FROM EUR 0.29 TO EUR 1.45
* DID NOT CHANGE TOTAL VALUE OF INVESTORS’ SHARES
* NUMBER OF SHARES HELD BY AN INVESTOR WHO PREVIOUSLY HAD 10 000 DECREASED TO 2 000
* THEIR VALUE ON EXCHANGE SHOULD CORRESPONDINGLY INCREASE FIVE TIMES
* IS BEING RENEWED AS OF 25 JANUARY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
